title: Best REAL Hip-Hop & Rap Songs of April 2013 (2-Disc)
description:
The latest monthly compilation from Real HipHopHead. No radio stuff on here. Straight underground. A lot of dope and slept-on joints. The best Hip-Hop that dropped in this past month of April 2013. 2 Discs, 45 total tracks. Enjoy.

Artists featured include: De La Soul, Redman, Joey Bada$$, Black Thought, Blu, R.A. The Rugged Man, DOOM, Ghostface Killah, Reks and many more.
